titleStmt.title: The innocent mans's second-proffer made unto his present adversaries October 22. 1649. And communicated unto them, by his loving brother, Collonell Robert Lilburne.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end of letter: John Lilburne. Dated: Tower, Octob. 22, 1649.
Includes list: The names of the severall bookes and papers, written and published by Lieutenant Collonel John Lilburne since his contest with the Bishops, in the yeare 1637.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
